title: Council Directive 92/94/EEC of 9 November 1992 amending Directive 75/273/EEC concerning the Community list of less- favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Italy)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 92/94/EEC of 9 November 1992 amending Directive 75/273/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Italy)
THE CONCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in Italy in the Annex to Directive 75/273/EEC is hereby supplemented to include the areas listed in the Annex to this Directive.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Italy.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1992.
For the Council
The President
D. HURD
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1. Directive as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1).(2) OJ No C 225, 1. 9. 1992, p. 7.(3) Opinion delivered on 30 October 1992 (not yet published in the Official  Journal).(4) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 72. Amended by Directive 84/167/EEC (OJ No L 82, 28. 2. 1984, p. 1).
ANNEX
